title: Print SSCC Pallet Labels
description: After building a pallet for a large retail customer, the operator must generate and apply a Serial Shipping Container Code (SSCC) label for compliance.

tasks.description: After a pallet is fully picked, scan the pallet ID to begin the labeling process.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system retrieves the contents of the scanned pallet.

tasks.description: Generate a unique SSCC number for the pallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a new, unique SSCC barcode.

tasks.description: Print the SSCC label in the customer-specified format and apply it to the pallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliant GS1-128 label is printed and applied.
